TEXT.TITLE: AMERICAN CREDIT CARD <ACCT.O> TO MAKE PURCHASE
TEXT.BODY: American Credit Card Telephone Co said it has completed arrangements to purchase 500,000 of its common shares and 500,000 of its warrants as well as all payphone technology, software and rights from Digvitech Inc's <DGTC.O> Digitech Communications Inc affiliate. Reuter
